FLAVOUR_0_CLUBNAME.message: 星际飞行员燃料合作社

FLAVOUR_0_MEMBER_INTRO.message: 你也许想要在这儿购买燃料和处理 {radioactives}.

FLAVOUR_0_NONMEMBER_INTRO.message: {clubname} is an independent organisation dedicated to providing discounted starship fuel to its members. Branches can be found throughout the galaxy. Benefits of membership include:

LIST_BENEFITS_FUEL_INTRO.message: Our own stocks of fuel, independent of the general market

LIST_BENEFITS_JOIN.message: Join now! Annual membership costs only {membership_fee}

WE_WILL_ONLY_DISPOSE_OF.message: 你买了多少吨 {military_fuel} 我们就帮你处理多少吨 {radioactives}.

WHAT_CONDITIONS_APPLY.message: 对 {radioactives} 处理有什么条件?

YOUR_MEMBERSHIP_APPLICATION_HAS_BEEN_DEC.message: 你的会员资格申请已经被拒绝了.

YOU_ARE_NOW_A_MEMBER.message: 你现在是会员了. 你的会员资格将过期于 {expiry_date}.

YOU_MUST_BUY.message: 在我们帮你处理{radioactives} 前你必须购买我们的 {military_fuel}
